name: RestrictedSafe
description: Gnosis Safe - A multisignature wallet with support for confirmations using signed messages based on ERC191.

eventDecorators.name: AddedOwner
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ApproveHash
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ChangedThreshold
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ExecutionFailure
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: ExecutionSuccess
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: RemovedOwner
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: SafeReceived
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

eventDecorators.name: SafeSetup
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: implementation
parameterDecorators.description: The new subToken implementation*.

parameterDecorators.name: proxy
parameterDecorators.description: The variable debt token proxy address.

eventDecorators.name: SignMsg
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another, either via `#transfer` or `#transferFrom`. Emitted when the implementation of a variable debt token is upgraded.

functionDecorators.name: addOwnerWithThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Adds the owner `owner` to the Safe and updates the threshold to `_threshold`. Allows to add a new owner to the Safe and update the threshold at the same time. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: New owner address.

parameterDecorators.name: _threshold
parameterDecorators.description: New threshold.

functionDecorators.name: approveHash
functionDecorators.description: Marks a hash as approved. This can be used to validate a hash that is used by a signature.

parameterDecorators.name: hashToApprove
parameterDecorators.description: The hash that should be marked as approved for signatures that are verified by this contract.

functionDecorators.name: changeThreshold
functionDecorators.description: Changes the threshold of the Safe to `_threshold`. Allows to update the number of required confirmations by Safe owners. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: _threshold
parameterDecorators.description: New threshold.

functionDecorators.name: checkNSignatures
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data, hash. Will revert otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: dataHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the data (could be either a message hash or transaction hash).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: That should be signed (this is passed to an external validator contract).

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Signature data that should be verified. Can be ECDSA signature, contract signature (EIP-1271) or approved hash.

parameterDecorators.name: requiredSignatures
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of required valid signatures.

functionDecorators.name: checkSignatures
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data, hash. Will revert otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: dataHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the data (could be either a message hash or transaction hash).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: That should be signed (this is passed to an external validator contract).

parameterDecorators.name: signatures
parameterDecorators.description: Signature data that should be verified. Can be ECDSA signature, contract signature (EIP-1271) or approved hash.

functionDecorators.name: encodeTransactionData
functionDecorators.description: Returns the bytes that are hashed to be signed by owners.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Destination address.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: Ether value.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data payload.

parameterDecorators.name: operation
parameterDecorators.description: Operation type.

parameterDecorators.name: safeTxGas
parameterDecorators.description: Gas that should be used for the safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: baseGas
parameterDecorators.description: Gas costs for that are independent of the transaction execution(e.g. base transaction fee, signature check, payment of the refund).

parameterDecorators.name: gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum gas price that should be used for this transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: gasToken
parameterDecorators.description: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.

parameterDecorators.name: refundReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).

parameterDecorators.name: _nonce
parameterDecorators.description: Transaction nonce.

functionDecorators.name: execTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Allows to execute a Safe transaction by the only owner and then pays the account that submitted the transaction. This method does not take signatures since it checks that the sender is the only owner of the safe. Note: The fees are always transferred, even if the user transaction fails.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Destination address of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: Ether value of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data payload of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: operation
parameterDecorators.description: Operation type of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: safeTxGas
parameterDecorators.description: Gas that should be used for the Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: baseGas
parameterDecorators.description: Gas costs that are independent of the transaction execution(e.g. base transaction fee, signature check, payment of the refund).

parameterDecorators.name: gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: Gas price that should be used for the payment calculation.

parameterDecorators.name: gasToken
parameterDecorators.description: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.

parameterDecorators.name: refundReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).

functionDecorators.name: getChainId
functionDecorators.description: Returns the chain id used by this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getMessageHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

parameterDecorators.name: message
parameterDecorators.description: Message that should be hashed.

functionDecorators.name: getMessageHashForSafe
functionDecorators.description: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

parameterDecorators.name: safe
parameterDecorators.description: Safe to which the message is targeted.

parameterDecorators.name: message
parameterDecorators.description: Message that should be hashed.

functionDecorators.name: getOwners
functionDecorators.description: Returns array of owners.

functionDecorators.name: getStorageAt
functionDecorators.description: Reads `length` bytes of storage in the currents contract.

parameterDecorators.name: offset
parameterDecorators.description: - the offset in the current contract's storage in words to start reading from.

parameterDecorators.name: length
parameterDecorators.description: - the number of words (32 bytes) of data to read.

functionDecorators.name: getTransactionHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns hash to be signed by owners.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Destination address.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: Ether value.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data payload.

parameterDecorators.name: operation
parameterDecorators.description: Operation type.

parameterDecorators.name: safeTxGas
parameterDecorators.description: Fas that should be used for the safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: baseGas
parameterDecorators.description: Gas costs for data used to trigger the safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: gasPrice
parameterDecorators.description: Maximum gas price that should be used for this transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: gasToken
parameterDecorators.description: Token address (or 0 if ETH) that is used for the payment.

parameterDecorators.name: refundReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address of receiver of gas payment (or 0 if tx.origin).

parameterDecorators.name: _nonce
parameterDecorators.description: Transaction nonce.

functionDecorators.name: isValidSignature
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of updated EIP-1271See https://github.com/gnosis/util-contracts/blob/bb5fe5fb5df6d8400998094fb1b32a178a47c3a1/contracts/StorageAccessible.sol. Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data. The save does not implement the interface since `checkSignatures` is not a view method. The method will not perform any state changes (see parameters of `checkSignatures`).

parameterDecorators.name: _dataHash
parameterDecorators.description: Hash of the data signed on the behalf of address(msg.sender).

parameterDecorators.name: _signature
parameterDecorators.description: Signature byte array associated with _dataHash.

returnDecorators.description: a bool upon valid or invalid signature with corresponding _dataHash.

functionDecorators.name: isValidSignature
functionDecorators.description: Implementation of ISignatureValidator (see `interfaces/ISignatureValidator.sol`). Should return whether the signature provided is valid for the provided data.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrary length data signed on the behalf of address(msg.sender).

parameterDecorators.name: _signature
parameterDecorators.description: Signature byte array associated with _data.

returnDecorators.description: a bool upon valid or invalid signature with corresponding _data.

functionDecorators.name: removeOwner
functionDecorators.description: Removes the owner `owner` from the Safe and updates the threshold to `_threshold`. Allows to remove an owner from the Safe and update the threshold at the same time. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: prevOwner
parameterDecorators.description: Owner that pointed to the owner to be removed in the linked list.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: Owner address to be removed.

parameterDecorators.name: _threshold
parameterDecorators.description: New threshold.

functionDecorators.name: requiredTxGas
functionDecorators.description: Deprecated in favor of common/StorageAccessible.sol and will be removed in next version. Allows to estimate a Safe transaction. This method is only meant for estimation purpose, therefore the call will always revert and encode the result in the revert data. Since the `estimateGas` function includes refunds, call this method to get an estimated of the costs that are deducted from the safe with `execTransaction`.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Destination address of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: Ether value of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Data payload of Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: operation
parameterDecorators.description: Operation type of Safe transaction.

returnDecorators.description: Estimate without refunds and overhead fees (base transaction and payload data gas costs).

functionDecorators.name: setup
functionDecorators.description: Setup function sets initial storage of contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _owners
parameterDecorators.description: List of Safe owners.

parameterDecorators.name: _threshold
parameterDecorators.description: Number of required confirmations for a Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: paymentToken
parameterDecorators.description: Token that should be used for the payment (0 is ETH).

parameterDecorators.name: payment
parameterDecorators.description: Value that should be paid.

parameterDecorators.name: paymentReceiver
parameterDecorators.description: Address that should receive the payment (or 0 if tx.origin).

functionDecorators.name: simulate
functionDecorators.description: Performs a delegatecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). Catches revert and returns encoded result as bytes.

parameterDecorators.name: targetContract
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

parameterDecorators.name: calldataPayload
parameterDecorators.description: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).

functionDecorators.name: simulateAndRevert
functionDecorators.description: Performs a delegatecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). This method reverts with data equal to `abi.encode(bool(success), bytes(response))`. Specifically, the `returndata` after a call to this method will be: `success:bool || response.length:uint256 || response:bytes`.

parameterDecorators.name: targetContract
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

parameterDecorators.name: calldataPayload
parameterDecorators.description: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

functionDecorators.name: swapOwner
functionDecorators.description: Replaces the owner `oldOwner` in the Safe with `newOwner`. Allows to swap/replace an owner from the Safe with another address. This can only be done via a Safe transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: prevOwner
parameterDecorators.description: Owner that pointed to the owner to be replaced in the linked list.

parameterDecorators.name: oldOwner
parameterDecorators.description: Owner address to be replaced.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: New owner address.
